Package view

Class OrderMenuView

java.lang.Object
view.abstracts.ARenderView
view.OrderMenuView
All Implemented Interfaces:
view.interfaces.ViewHelperInterface, view.interfaces.ViewInterface
public class OrderMenuView extends view.abstracts.ARenderView
The OrderMenuView is a class in the View layer that displays the Order Menu View This class extends the abstract base view classARenderView

    • renderApp

      public void renderApp(int selection)
      Displays various options and performs corresponding actions based on the user's input. The renderApp method renders different parts of the application based on the selection parameter.
      Parameters:
      selection - The selection parameter determines which part of the application to render. Valid values are:
      • 0: Displays Order Menu View choices
      • 2: Displays Edit Cart
      • 4: Prints the Title Border for Checkout

    • renderChoice

      public void renderChoice()
      Displays the Over Menu View choices
